resources.string: Enter search term into text box, and press search to search for Guardian articles. Tap on a title in the list to view its info, then tap on the link to go to the article, or on save article to favorites to view article later.

Here we have a list of recommended articles that were part of your previous searches. Simply tap on a title to view its info, then tap on the link to go to the article, or tap on save article to favorites, just like the Search Page!

Here we have all of your saved articles. Tap on a title to view its info, then tap on the link to go to the article. If you are done with the article, and no longer wish it to take up space, simply tap delete to send it to the trash.

Deleted something from your favorites accidentally? Simply tap on the title of the accidentally deleted article and tap yes to restore the article to your favorites. If you are truly done with the article, and wish for it to be permanently deleted, tap permanently delete article
